Text:
Film also know as:

Kama Sutra - The Truth About Love  1992 
Director: Nick Jones
A Vision Video Production
Producer: Alex Panton
Featuring: Dawn St John, Kelvin Wise, Artemis Manias, Paul Haan
In this beautiful documentary the Kama Sutra is explained by watching a few beautiful couples making
love. For anyone how wants to better their sex-lives, this is a must.
Video: 6,5/10
Audio: 7/10
This is a very rare torrent, so if you choose to download please seed for at least two weeks. Endoy
Nice movie, shame the hardcoded Chinese subs ruin the view.

Excellent translation of Kama Sutra is made by Indra Sinha. It's named The Love Teachings of Kama Sutra  http://www.amazon.com/Love-Teachings-Kama-Sutra-Extracts/dp/156924779X

Some pages of his book can be seen scanned here:  http://indrasinha.com/books/kama-sutra/

Kama Sutra and Kama Sutra 2 here:
